item.title: Video Editor for YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a long-form video editor to join our team and help with editing our YouTube channel content. The ideal candidate should have basic understanding of video editing techniques, along with some experience working with social media. You will be responsible for finding footage of popular TV shows and movies, adding effects according to the provided script, and ensuring the final videos meet our guidelines. This role requires an attention to detail, the ability to take feedbacks efficiently, and the ability to meet deadlines. Bonus point if you have experience with YouTube, or you are interested in the femininity/K-content niche.

For references on editing styles, you can take a look at these channels:
https://www.youtube.com/@therealmanifestelle
https://www.youtube.com/@PensiveWhiskers

If you want to be part of a growing YouTube channel, we would love to hear from you.

Skills needed:
- Proficiency in video editing
- Attention to detail
- Ability to take feedbacks and meet deadlines
- Strong communication skills

Starting rate is at $15/video (20-23 minutes) + up to 100% bonus based on performance
We have a performance review every month and raise the pay rate if the editor has been delivering high-quality work. We are looking for long-term collaboration, hence a great attitude and a learning mindset are much appreciated.

Budget: $1,200
Posted On: June 18, 2024 08:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve, Audio Editing, Movie
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve, Audio Editing, Movie
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video editing for / Start-up Image Video - Upwork
item.description:
I have recently founded a company and need a short video (approx. 1 minute) to describe the services of my company.

I have a video recording for this. However, I don't like the result yet.

I would like to have the background edited.
I need color grading, it looks completely like "raw material".
I need a professional intro and outro based on my key visual (a color cloud)

Overall a professional reworking of the existing material is needed, done by experienced experts. Thank you!

Hourly Range: $20.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 08:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Motion Design, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Motion Design, Motion Graphics
Country: Switzerland
click to apply

item.title: Editor Anime Self Improvement YT Channel (4-8 vids/month) - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a dedicated hard working video editor who is serious about the quality he delivers and is open to learn/adjust to the editingstyle i need.

Example videos:
1: https://youtu.be/ejbxiCcE-Bc?si=cBaEslMxf-YPpjiI
2: https://youtu.be/fOgtZyt8xfg?si=x-xHFQvJaxmsaFTX

Please don't bother to send your proposal if you haven't watched the example videos above.

Requirments:
- Editing is your fulltime job and not a side hustle
- Excelent in meeting deadlines (48-72 hours)
- Tight commmunication & fluent in english
- Knowledge on how to source HD (anime)footage to enhance the script
- Excelent in adding relevant music and sfx to enhance the emotion of the script and improve retention
- Excelent in adding motion graphics to improve the overal quality of the video (especialy important on boring or diffecult parts of the script to keep retention high)

What we offer:
- Atleast 4-8 projects (consistent work)
- Possibilty on long-term coöperation (if first 4-8 videos perform well and channel gets monitized)
- Access to upbeat subscription for non copyrighted music and sfx

Video lenght is 8-10 minutes avg.

Please send work RELEVANT to the example video.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 18, 2024 07:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Drone Footage Promotional Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to work on our drone footage and create two promotional videos - one 25-second video and one 1-minute video. The footage will be provided to you, and your task will be to edit it to create engaging and visually striking videos that effectively showcase our solar carport structures.
  Relevant skills:
  - Video editing
  - Drone footage editing
  - Creative storytelling
  - Attention to detail
  - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  
  Size: Small
  Duration: Under 1 month
  Expertise: Intermediate


Posted On: June 18, 2024 07:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production
Country: Australia

item.title: Video Text and Effects - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to enhance a pre-edited video with text and other effects to make it more engaging and visually appealing. The video has already been color-corrected and trimmed, so your primary task will be to add creative text overlays, transitions, and effects that align with the video's theme and message. The final result should be a captivating and polished video that grabs the viewer's attention.

    Required skills:
    - Video editing
    - Visual effects
    - Text overlay
    - Transition effects
    - Creativity

    Size: Medium
    Duration: Under 1 month
    Expertise: Intermediate


Posted On: June 18, 2024 07:38 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Product Review Video Creator (Amazon Video) - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! I am Lradon from Andvids.We are a video production agency from China assisting our clients in finding  content creators to produce unboxing videos. You can not only get free products(beauty,household,outdoor products,children's and pets' toys etc.), but also commissions by doing this in your free time.

Here are some requirements for the shoot:
1. The length of the video is 1-3 minutes, of which 30% of the time is used for explanation, and 70% of the time is used to show the use scenario of the product
2. Shoot in landscape mode (16:9) ，your face need to be shown in video
3. A clean, bright shooting environment
4. Able to introduce products in fluent and clear English
5. Introduce the selling points and functions of the product, and use it in multiple scenarios.
6. Don't mention price, discount
7. In case of emergency, illness, move or vacation, please inform us in advance.
Do not show QR codes of packaging or products in the video, and do not mention personal information

About project time and delivery method
Please complete the shooting and edit within three days after receiving the product.
And name the video in this format: order number + product name + your name, and put the video Upload it to Google Drive, set the link permission to open and send it to me.
I will pay you after I review it.

Most importantly, we need the original video.
About copyright: After you agree to send the video to us, we have the right to use your likeness for promotional purposes, including but not limited to uploading the video to Amazon

Special case treatment：
  However, if you cannot complete the shooting on time after receiving the product, lose contact, do not shoot, you will be responsible for this, the solution is as follows (choose one):
1. Pay for the product.
2. Forward the product to the new address and bear the shipping cost.

Long-term cooperation：
  The first three videos are the experimental list.Of course I'll still give you a commission.
   After that, if the video effect is good and the communication between the two parties is smooth, long-term cooperation can be considered.

If you are interested in this job,feel free to contact me and please send me an introduction video or anything you have shot recently.Look forward to receiving your applications.Thank you!



Budget: $10
Posted On: June 18, 2024 07:27 UTC
Category: Product Reviews
Skills:Video Production
Skills: Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: China
click to apply

item.title: Can you edit Military Technology videos? - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there!

Can you edit Military Technology videos?
Are you an experienced video editor?
Are you interested in working in a TEAM with other experienced members?

If you have a TRIPLE-YES, then yes, we will review your application.

Similar channels to ours would be:
• https://www.youtube.com/FrontCost/videos
• https://www.youtube.com/@Hyperspeed5/videos

We are looking for a long-term collaboration on a project basis in the beginning, and eventually, if we are a good fit, we would also have a full-time or retainer opportunity.

Please do not apply if you do not have any experience.
I look forward to working with you!

Nikos

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 18, 2024 07:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Military
Skills: Video Commercial, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Military
Country: Germany
click to apply
